title: HELP beauty spa logo needs typeface suggestions-
content:
Hi I am starting up an Eyelash Extension spa- the logo picture is a very rough draft. My demographic is early 20s to late 40s with average being late 20s-early 30s. Am trying to convey an upscale, chic, modern (but not cold), stylish, with elegant/feminine touch. Suggestions of typefaces is VERY appreciated! Have been going crazy trying to find something that looks ok. Was thinking modern/script but am open to other typefaces/script. Also what would you recommend then for tagline? (Logo might be edited with box around it and/or without tagline). Again your guys feedback is very very much appreciated!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [lashesbabyadviselogo.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202857/http:/typophile.com/files/lashesbabyadviselogo.pdf) | 164.31 KB |
author: shawnie.leaf

comments.content:
The Zapfino leaves me a bit cold (it’s curvy, but a bit wimpy).

I’d go for a balance of legibility and elegance. Some script typefaces that might work for you:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typadelic/pointedbrush/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202857/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typadelic/pointedbrush/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typadelic/pointedbrush/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/aguafina-script/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202857/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/aguafina-script/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/aguafina-script/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/sinfonieta/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202857/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/sinfonieta/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/sinfonieta/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/aerotype/arbordale/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202857/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/aerotype/arbordale/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/aerotype/arbordale/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/amorinda-ot/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202857/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/amorinda-ot/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/amorinda-ot/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/koziupack/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202857/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/koziupack/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/koziupack/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/scholtz/miss-donna/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202857/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/scholtz/miss-donna/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/scholtz/miss-donna/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/re-type/dulcinea/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202857/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/re-type/dulcinea/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/re-type/dulcinea/")
